description: This dataset shows the 2012 School Progress Report Card data elements for each CPS elementary school.  The report card is an annual summary of how the school is doing.  For more information on the School Progress Report Cards, please see http://cps.edu/Schools/Pages/SchoolProgressReportCards.aspx.

name: Chicago Public Schools – Elementary School Progress Report Card (2012-2013)
